title: LeezHamilton
author: LeezHamilton
created_time: February 13, 2024, 03:50:59 AMLast edit: February 13, 2024, 05:13:47 AM by LeezHamilton
content: Craig Wight is not  Satoshi Nakamoto, said the real Satoshi Nakamoto in a Tweet The real Satoshi Nakamoto has come forward and twitted in his new Twitter Account, He has made the clear statement that Craig Wright has infringed his Bitcoin White Paper.  The real Satoshi Nakamoto has informed Justice Lord James Mellor that Craig Wright is not the genuine author of the Bitcoin White Paper in an official Letter on the 9 February 2024.  He has made it clear that the real Satoshi Nakamoto is a British Economic Scientist who wrote the Bitcoin White Paper on  5 May 2007 18 months before publication on 31 October  when Hal Finney came to meet Satoshi Nakamoto in South London with Wei Dai and Alex Finney ad His Father Lou Finney From USA in Croydon on 26 October and met Satoshi Nakamoto. Twitter Account of the Real Satoshi Nakamoto -   https://twitter.com/SatoshiN4k4moto - Leez Hamilton  JournalistNews of the World

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: twitter name is not satoshi.. @SatoshiN4k4moto[Joined February 2024] (2 hours ago)also has no followers and a name not easily searchable.. so im guessing YOU created it to troll.. get a better jobyou are not even a journalist. you lack even the basic research skillsoh and news of the world went defunct in 2011..from all records of the real satoshis posts over the different platforms of 2009-2010.. he never met Hal nor Wei Dai

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: LeezHamilton on February 13, 2024, 03:50:59 AMCraig Wight is not  Satoshi Nakamoto, said the real Satoshi Nakamoto in Twitter The real Satoshi Nakamoto has come forward and twitted in his new Twitter Account, He has made the clear statement that Craig Wright has infringed his Bitcoin White Paper.  The real Satoshi Nakamoto has informed Justice Lord James Mellor that Craig Wright is not the genuine author of the Bitcoin White Paper in an official Letter on the 9 February 2024.  He has made it clear that the real Satoshi Nakamoto is a British Economic Scientist who wrote the Bitcoin White Paper on  5 May 2007 18 months before publication on 31 October  when Hal Finney came to meet Satoshi Nakamoto in South London with Wei Dai and Alex Finney ad His Father Lou Finney From USA in Croydon on 26 October and met Satoshi Nakamoto. Twitter Account of the Real Satoshi Nakamoto -   https://twitter.com/SatoshiN4k4moto - Leez Hamilton  JournalistNews of the World Is this some sort of joke? How did you come by the conclusion that a random guy who just showed up on twitter and addressed himself as Satoshi is worth paying attention to? If Satoshi decides to come out from anonymity,  he will not stress the public in proving himself, just a signed message from one of his wallets will do. I understand the dramas and scam attempts that happens during bull run, so this one is no exception. Oh I forgot, Twitter(X) is now paying,  so building a new account using the biggest name in the digital space is not a bad idea.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: > zero followers> new X/Twitter account> new Bitcointalk account> "Journalist, News of the World"Lmao this is probably the worst attempt of claiming to be Satoshi, ever. Even worse than CSW, which is freakin tough to beat.Also, your tweet reminded me of something LMAO.

comments.author: LeezHamilton
comments.body: No it is not a Joke. The Court Room was so hot so Satoshi Nakamoto just has contacted Justice James Mellor and wrote him the Official Letter on 9 February. Official Google Blog of Satoshi Nakamoto https://sites.google.com/view/letter-of-satoshi

When the truth comes no body like it.  no one met with him.. and that was the point of satoshi.. to stay anonymousYou are wrong ! you can go to Hal Finney's wife and ask her why Mr Harrold Finney went to London on 24 October 2008 and met Satoshi Nakamoto on 26 October.

comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: Quote from: LeezHamilton on February 13, 2024, 04:07:06 AMNo it is not a Joke. The Court Room was so hot so Satoshi Nakamoto just has contacted Justice James Mellor and wrote him the Official Letter on 9 February. Official Google Blog of Satoshi Nakamoto https://sites.google.com/view/letter-of-satoshi  Why would the court need the voice of satoshi to dispute something they consider a joke. Craig had no valid evidence to claim he is satoshi and this matter has been going on for some years and now satoshi chose to come out? Come on you can't be that gullible, no offense though. Michael Jackson is not really dead. he has just changed his names and living in Panama with his news Girl Friend.  and you ?  you are living in Tokyo !   People would start taking you serious if you provide an evidence and not start spouting things out of nowhere. Quote from: LeezHamilton on February 13, 2024, 04:23:28 AMYou are wrong ! you can go to Hal Finney's wife and ask her why Mr Harrold Finney went to London on 24 October 2008 and met Satoshi Nakamoto on 26 October.  and you knew about it because? To be sincere if starting to feel you trolling You say things and haven't backed it up by any evidence I can just come out now and say am Satoshi.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: Quote from: LeezHamilton on February 13, 2024, 04:23:28 AMYou are wrong ! you can go to Hal Finney's wife and ask her why Mr Harrold Finney went to London on 24 October 2008 and met Satoshi Nakamoto on 26 October. do some research!hal and satoshis communications began in 2008 when satoshi announced bitcoin on the mailing list asked him if its ok to mention hals work in satoshi's white paper. and then hal got intrigued to try it when the code was first released.. they never met. they just communicated over the interneti think you are confusing "meeting" with mailing-list correspondence

comments.author: LeezHamilton
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on February 13, 2024, 04:43:54 AMQuote from: LeezHamilton on February 13, 2024, 04:23:28 AMYou are wrong ! you can go to Hal Finney's wife and ask her why Mr Harrold Finney went to London on 24 October 2008 and met Satoshi Nakamoto on 26 October. do some research!hal had disabilitieshal and satoshis communications began in 2008 when satoshi simply asked him if its ok to mention hals work in satoshi's white paper. and then hal got intrigued to try it when the code was first released.. they never met. they just communicated over the internetThere are many thing kept secret. I am here to let the Bitcoin community know the facts and debunk all the fiction. I assumed you are Andreas, if you are then you also met Satoshi three times.  The Hal Finney's  Twitter Account @HalFin is not belongs to Harrold Finney. That Account belong to Satoshi Nakamoto, He first created it for Halloween Finance@HalFin in 6 May 2007,  later Satoshi Read about Hal Finney's PGM Protocol and uploaded Hal's pic there to make a gift to Hal Finney. Satoshi rename the account Halloween Finance to  Harold Finney@HalFin. Satoshi Choose to Publish the White Paper  in 31 October on Halloween day because there is a story of Bitcoin that has a connection to Halloween day of 31 October 2006.

Are you really Frank ?

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: Quote from: LeezHamilton on February 13, 2024, 03:50:59 AMTwitter Account of the Real Satoshi Nakamoto -   https://twitter.com/SatoshiN4k4motoSoon this X account of the supposed real Satoshi Nakamoto will be claiming to be truly the one and we would have another one added to the list of so many faketoshis. Just opening an account in X and claiming to be this and that does not qualify anyone to be the genuine and real person. When will this madness or rather jokes stop. We all know how we can determine the real Satoshi Nakamoto and unless those criteria are met, anybody claiming to be one should just be relegated as a big joker.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Okay, I'll just believe that this will be a sarcasm post coming from a newbie who doesn't know anything about Satoshi Nakamoto.Or I guess I'll treat what OP said as a funny post because maybe he's kind of bored for whatever reason.I did look at the Twitter Account. 4 followers? Maybe those 4 are his other accounts, and then sharing some stupid comments. Well, Craig Wright isn't Satoshi Nakamoto that's why he's been called "Faketoshi", but the one who said on Twitter isn't the real Satoshi either.Try again, OP, or take some pills. Don't be like one of many trolls here who are just posting nonsense. Have a life and research maybe a little bit.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: LeezHamilton on February 13, 2024, 04:07:06 AMNo it is not a Joke. The Court Room was so hot so Satoshi Nakamoto just has contacted Justice James Mellor and wrote him the Official Letter on 9 February. Official Google Blog of Satoshi Nakamoto https://sites.google.com/view/letter-of-satoshi Original advertisement for your Twitter account. I laughed out loud. I wonder how the "real" Satoshi Nakamoto confirmed in court that he is who he says he is? And why would the real Satoshi Nakamoto create a blog on Google when he has a whole forum?

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: LeezHamilton on February 13, 2024, 03:50:59 AMSatoshi Nakamoto is a British Economic Scientist who wrote the Bitcoin White PaperSo you want us to believe that Satoshi Nakamoto was a British Scientist? Are you sure that we will believe in your words? I think no one will believe you and that's why your Twitter account has only 2 follows while the thread has been read by many guys already. Just go and get a life my friend, we aren't here to believe in such things and the funny part is that you used name of Craig Wight to get more attention from the users. Satoshi Nakamoto isn't a British name and I think you need to understand that, just go and do some research before making such threads.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: LeezHamilton on February 13, 2024, 03:50:59 AMCraig Wight is not  Satoshi Nakamoto, said the real Satoshi Nakamoto in a Tweet The real Satoshi Nakamoto has come forward and twitted in his new Twitter Account, He has made the clear statement that Craig Wright has infringed his Bitcoin White Paper.  The real Satoshi Nakamoto has informed Justice Lord James Mellor that Craig Wright is not the genuine author of the Bitcoin White Paper in an official Letter on the 9 February 2024. Anybody is free to claim that he is Satoshi Nakamoto, but such an individual will have to do only one identity verification which is in signing a message on bitcointalk, this is the only means the public and the bitcoin community can believe on a come back of Satoshi Nakamoto, but on a real sense, he's not coming back to claim himself being the owner of bitcoin when everything he's doing is all about financial privacy, trust and security.Quote from: LeezHamilton on February 13, 2024, 03:50:59 AMHe has made it clear that the real Satoshi Nakamoto is a British Economic Scientist who wrote the Bitcoin White Paper on  5 May 2007 18 months before publication on 31 October  when Hal Finney came to meet Satoshi Nakamoto in South London with Wei Dai and Alex Finney ad His Father Lou Finney From USA in Croydon on 26 October and met Satoshi Nakamoto. we don't need all these baseless proofs anymore, what we want is the continues adoption of bitcoin and once this is achieved, Satoshi is more successful, he can't come so low to make public appearance for nothing..

comments.author: icalical
comments.body: Yes sure, let's all believe that a newly registered account, with 2 followers is the real Satoshi Nakamoto. I mean if you can be skeptical about Craig Wight being Satoshi Nakamoto, then you should also be skeptical of any other person claiming to be Satoshi. I still don't get it why people are claiming to be Satoshi. They will not get anything except possibly being hunted by the government and maybe some criminal group. There is no Bitcoin rewards or any other rewards. I doubt the real Satoshi Nakamoto will showing up, even if Bitcoin is about to die or in a crysis.
